data.name: Physics Playground
data.detailed_description:
Physics Playground is a game that is all about cubes and physics. You are on a huge playground where you can be as creative as you want. Build a small tower or, if that's too boring for you, create thousands of cubes and let them all fly through the air. But be careful not to catapult yourself into the sky.

tools

Use your "tools" to create new cubes, to move cubes, to fling cubes, to fling the player or just to wreak havoc.

buttons

Spread across your playground are large, red, glowing buttons just waiting to be pressed.

physics

Almost everything in this game can be moved, and when things can be moved, chaos is not far behind.
data.about_the_game:

physics

Almost everything in this game can be moved, and when things can be moved, chaos is not far behind.
data.short_description: Physics Playground is a little indie game in which you can experiment with different cubes, tools, buttons and of course physics.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: dual core 1.7GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 400 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: quad core 2.3Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
